resources.string: No response from server. Please try again.

Fail to get config from server. Please try again.
Fail to unzip Engine zip file.
Fail to unzip Resource zip file.
Fail to unzip Custom Update zip file.
Fail to unzip Refresh Update zip file.
Refresh Update Hash Table is not valid.
Fail to download Refresh Update File.
The app cannot be run with the version of %s you are currently using. Please update to the latest version from Play Store and rerun.
An error occurred while setting offline mode.
There is no MatrixMobile setup to use offline mode.
Can not launch App without permissions.
Please reinstall App or initial App data in system settings cause permissions are denied permanently.
Application will be shut down after initialize.
App %s is not installed. Would you like to go to the installation page?
Offline mode can be launched only after online. App will be shut down.
Network is not available. Do you want to launch with offline mode? Some actions could be unavailable.
If camera permission is not granted, you cannot use the camera.\nDo you want to grant camera permission?
Audio Record permission is not granted.\nDo you want to grant recording permission?
Additional %s will be downloaded.\nDo you want to proceed?
The app to be used for camera is not installed.
The app to be used for voice recording is not installed.
The app to be used for video recording is not installed.
Camera permission use has been disabled.\nPlease allow permission use in settings before using.
record audio permission use has been disabled.\nPlease allow permission use in settings before using.
record audio and camera permission use has been disabled.\nPlease allow permission use in settings before using.
You will need to restart the App for the changes to take effect.\nExit the App.
You can select files up to %s.
